Notepub LLM Full Context
Canonical site: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/
Version: 0.1.1
Last-Updated: 2026-02-10

Scope
- This file is a concise navigation map for LLM ingestion.
- Content is bilingual (EN/RU), with English as default route.

Language routes
- EN root: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/
- RU root: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/
- Redirect: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ -> /en/

Core sections (EN)
- Docs hub: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs
- Concepts: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/concepts
- Authoring: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/authoring
- Operations: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/operations
- Reference: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/reference

Task: Onboarding path (EN)
1. https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/overview
2. https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/getting-started
3. https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/configuration
4. https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/rules-yaml
5. https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/build-and-deploy

Task: Operations and runtime (EN)
- Commands: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/commands
- Search: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/search
- Themes and templates: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/themes
- Troubleshooting: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/troubleshooting

Task: Reference pages (EN)
- Configuration reference: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/configuration
- rules.yaml reference: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/rules-yaml
- Collections reference: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/collections-reference
- Artifacts and outputs: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/artifacts-reference
- Engine changelog: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/en/docs/engine-changelog

RU mirrors
- Docs hub: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs
- Start: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs/overview
- Getting started: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs/getting-started
- Configuration: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs/configuration
- Rules reference: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/docs/rules-yaml

Machine-readable endpoints
- Sitemap: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/robots.txt
- Search index (EN static): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/search.json
- Search index (RU static): https://cookiespooky.github.io/np/ru/search.json

Notes for indexing
- Prefer canonical URLs under /np/.
- Use hreflang to map EN/RU equivalents.
- Root path redirects to English default.
